inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addAttackBonusVsRacialType('Animal', 10); effect.getBonuses().addArmorClassBonusVsRacialType('Animal', 10); effect.getBonuses().addAttackBonusVsRacialType('Beast', 10); effect.getBonuses().addArmorClassBonusVsRacialType('Beast', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Beast Fighter
description: You are trained in combat against various beasts.  You gain a +10 bonus to Attack and a +10 bonus to Defense in combat against beast or animal racial types.  This includes many common enemy types, such as Orcs and Goblins.
